snippet.title: MamaShroom Trailer 1
snippet.description:
MamaShroom is an exciting adventure-filled 2D platformer set across a variety of different lands, each rendered in beautiful pixel art. 
Embarking alongside Mama, you will help her reunite with her children across 40 levels in a game that will surely delight any cottagecore lover. 
Your quest will be fraught with danger, but we know you will be the perfect quest companion. We can’t wait for you to come along! 

Key Features:
• Explore four different environments rendered in colourful and cosy pixel art.
• Meet Mama’s many children who will be sure to make you laugh, cry …or roll your eyes.
• Take the route most travelled on your quest with Mama. Alternatively, test your skills and reflexes as you uncover the secrets of hard mode, and see the 40 levels change.
• Collect as many ingredients as you can for the final family meal. Ten delicious end-game meals await.
• Enjoy the stunning pixel art visuals and whimsical soundtrack that brings the world of Mamashroom to life.
• Be a dedicated dinner host with the optional speed run timer.
• Leaderboard, see how you match up to Mama's other quest companions!

You look like a Fun-gi, we’d love for you to come along!

It releases on mid-July
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2465670/MamaShroom/
